mechanism	enzymes
rRNA_containing	RNase_E_tetra_mod_zn2(2),RNase_P_cplx_mod_mg2(2),generic_RNase,RNase_III_dim_mod_mg2(2),RNase_G_dim,RNase_T_dim_mod_mg2(4)
monocistronic	RNase_E_tetra_mod_zn2(2),RNase_P_cplx_mod_mg2(2),generic_RNase
polycistronic_wout_rRNA	RNase_E_tetra_mod_zn2(2),RNase_P_cplx_mod_mg2(2),generic_RNase,RNase_III_dim,RNase_G_dim,RNase_T_dim_mod_mg2(4)
